00240 void CnipolAsymHists::PreFill()
00241 {
00242    ((TH1*) o["hChVsDelim"])->SetBins(gNDelimeters*10, 0, gNDelimeters, N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00243    ((TH1*) o["hDetVsDelim"])->SetBins(gNDelimeters*10, 0, gNDelimeters, N_DETECTORS, 0.5, N_DETECTORS+0.5);
00244    ((TH1*) o["hAsymVsDelim4Ch"])->SetBins(gNDelimeters*10, 0, gNDelimeters);
00245    ((TH1*) o["hAsymVsDelim4Det"])->SetBins(gNDelimeters*10, 0, gNDelimeters);
00246 
00247    SpinStateSetIter iSS=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
00248 
00249    for (; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS)
00250    {
00251       string sSS = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
00252 
00253       ((TH1*) o["hChVsDelim_"  + sSS])->SetBins(gNDelimeters*10, 0, gNDelimeters, N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00254       ((TH1*) o["hDetVsDelim_" + sSS])->SetBins(gNDelimeters*10, 0, gNDelimeters, N_DETECTORS, 0.5, N_DETECTORS+0.5);
00255    }
00256 }

00258 
00260 void CnipolAsymHists::Fill(ChannelEvent *ch)
00261 {
00262    UChar_t chId  = ch->GetChannelId();
00263    //UChar_t detId = ch->GetDetectorId();
00264    UChar_t bId   = ch->GetBunchId() + 1;
00265 
00266    //((TH1*) o["hDetVsBunchId"]) -> Fill(bId, detId);
00267 
00268    Float_t  kinEnergy = ch->GetKinEnergyAEDepend();
00269    //Float_t timeDiff  = ch->GetTdcAdcTimeDiff();
00270    Double_t time     = ((Double_t) ch->GetRevolutionId())/RHIC_REVOLUTION_FREQ;
00271 
00272    string sSS = gRunConfig.AsString( gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bId) );
00273 
00274    ((TH1*) o.find("hChVsBunchId_"    + sSS)->second) -> Fill(bId, chId);
00275    ((TH1*) o.find("hChVsKinEnergyA_" + sSS)->second) -> Fill(kinEnergy, chId);
00276    ((TH1*) o.find("hChVsDelim_"      + sSS)->second) -> Fill(time, chId);
00277    //((TH1*) o["hChVsLongiTimeDiff_" + sSS]) -> Fill(timeDiff, chId);
00278 }

00280 
00282 void CnipolAsymHists::FillDerived()
00283 {
00284    Info("FillDerived()", "Called");
00285 
00286    // First fill integral and derivative histograms
00287    TH2* hChVsDelim    = (TH2*) o["hChVsDelim"];
00288    TH2* hChVsBunchId  = (TH2*) o["hChVsBunchId"];
00289    TH2* hDetVsBunchId = (TH2*) o["hDetVsBunchId"];
00290    TH2* hDetVsDelim   = (TH2*) o["hDetVsDelim"];
00291 
00292    SpinStateSetIter iSS = gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
00293    for ( ; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS)
00294    {
00295       string sSS = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
00296 
00297       TH1* hChannelCounts_   = (TH1*) o["hChannelCounts_"   + sSS];
00298       TH2* hChVsBunchId_     = (TH2*) o["hChVsBunchId_"     + sSS];
00299       TH2* hChVsKinEnergyA_  = (TH2*) o["hChVsKinEnergyA_"  + sSS];
00300       TH2* hChVsDelim_       = (TH2*) o["hChVsDelim_"       + sSS];
00301       TH2* hDetVsBunchId_    = (TH2*) o["hDetVsBunchId_"    + sSS];
00302       TH2* hDetVsKinEnergyA_ = (TH2*) o["hDetVsKinEnergyA_" + sSS];
00303       TH2* hDetVsDelim_      = (TH2*) o["hDetVsDelim_"      + sSS];
00304 
00305       for (int iCh=1; iCh<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iCh++)
00306       {
00307          UInt_t counts = hChVsBunchId_->Integral(1, N_BUNCHES, iCh, iCh);
00308 
00309          hChannelCounts_->SetBinContent(iCh, counts);
00310 
00311          // Fill detector histograms from the channel ones
00312          // Skip disabled channels
00313          if (gMeasInfo->IsDisabledChannel(iCh)) continue;
00314 
00315          UShort_t iDet = RunConfig::GetDetectorId(iCh);
00316 
00317          for (int iBunch=1; iBunch<=hDetVsBunchId_->GetNbinsX(); iBunch++)
00318          {
00319             Double_t bc     = hChVsBunchId_->GetBinContent(iBunch, iCh);
00320             Double_t bc_det = hDetVsBunchId_->GetBinContent(iBunch, iDet);
00321             hDetVsBunchId_->SetBinContent(iBunch, iDet, bc_det + bc);
00322          }
00323 
00324          for (int iDelim=1; iDelim<=hDetVsDelim_->GetNbinsX(); iDelim++)
00325          {
00326             Double_t bc     = hChVsDelim_->GetBinContent(iDelim, iCh);
00327             Double_t bc_det = hDetVsDelim_->GetBinContent(iDelim, iDet);
00328             hDetVsDelim_->SetBinContent(iDelim, iDet, bc_det + bc);
00329          }
00330 
00331          for (int iKinE=1; iKinE<=hDetVsKinEnergyA_->GetNbinsX(); iKinE++)
00332          {
00333             Double_t bc     = hChVsKinEnergyA_->GetBinContent(iKinE, iCh);
00334             Double_t bc_det = hDetVsKinEnergyA_->GetBinContent(iKinE, iDet);
00335             hDetVsKinEnergyA_->SetBinContent(iKinE, iDet, bc_det + bc);
00336          }
00337       }
00338 
00339       hChVsDelim->Add(hChVsDelim_);
00340       hChVsBunchId->Add(hChVsBunchId_);
00341       hDetVsBunchId->Add(hDetVsBunchId_);
00342       hDetVsDelim->Add(hDetVsDelim_);
00343    }
00344 }
00345 
00346 
00348 void CnipolAsymHists::FillDerived(DrawObjContainer &oc)
00349 {
00350    Info("FillDerived(DrawObjContainer &oc)", "Called");
00351 
00352    CnipolHists *hists_std = (CnipolHists*) oc.d.find("std")->second;
00353 
00354    if (!hists_std) {
00355       Error("FillDerived(DrawObjContainer &oc)", "Histogram container \"std\" required");
00356       return;
00357    }
00358 
00359    SpinStateSetIter iSS = gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
00360 
00361    for (; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS) {
00362 
00363       string sSS = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
00364 
00365       TH2* hChVsLongiTimeDiff_ = (TH2*) o["hChVsLongiTimeDiff_" + sSS];
00366 
00367       ChannelSetIter iCh = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00368 
00369       for (; iCh!=gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end(); ++iCh) {
00370 
00371          string sChId("  ");
00372          sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", *iCh);
00373 
00374          DrawObjContainer *oc_ch = hists_std->d.find("channel" + sChId)->second;
00375 
00376          TH2* hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch_ss = (TH2*) oc_ch->o["hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch" + sChId + "_" + sSS];
00377          
00378          Int_t nBinsX = hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch_ss->GetNbinsX();
00379          Int_t nBinsY = hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch_ss->GetNbinsY();
00380 
00381          // Loop over time diff bins
00382          for (Int_t iby=1; iby<=nBinsY; iby++) {
00383 
00384             Double_t td = hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch_ss->GetYaxis()->GetBinCenter(iby);
00385             Double_t nEvents_ch_ss = hLongiTimeDiffVsEnergyA_ch_ss->Integral(1, nBinsX, iby, iby);
00386 
00387             Int_t tdBin = hChVsLongiTimeDiff_->GetXaxis()->FindBin(td);
00388             
00389             Int_t gBin = hChVsLongiTimeDiff_->GetBin(tdBin, *iCh);
00390             //Int_t gBin = hChVsLongiTimeDiff_->GetBin(iby, *iCh);
00391             hChVsLongiTimeDiff_->AddBinContent(gBin, nEvents_ch_ss);
00392             hChVsLongiTimeDiff_->SetEntries(hChVsLongiTimeDiff_->GetEntries() + nEvents_ch_ss);
00393          }
00394       }
00395    }
00396 
00397    // Some histograms in this container depend on the 'std' container
00398    // Strip-by-Strip Asymmetries
00399    gAsymCalculator.CalcStripAsymmetry(this);
00400    gAsymCalculator.CalcStripAsymmetryByProfile(this);
00401    gAsymCalculator.CalcKinEnergyAChAsym(this);
00402    gAsymCalculator.CalcLongiChAsym(this);
00403 
00404    //printf("XXX %f\n", run.polarization);
00405 
00406    //gAsymCalculator.CalcBunchAsym(*hDetVsBunchId);
00407    gAsymCalculator.CalcBunchAsym(this);
00408    gAsymCalculator.CalcBunchAsymSqrtFormula(this);
00409 
00410    //gAsymCalculator.CalcDelimAsym(this);
00411    gAsymCalculator.CalcDelimAsymSqrtFormula(this);
00412 }
00413 
00414 
00416 void CnipolAsymHists::PostFill()
00417 {
00418    // Assume all required histograms are filled
00419    // Fit (or do whatever) them at this step
00420 
00421    TH2* hAsymVsBunchId_X90 = (TH2*) o["hAsymVsBunchId_X90"];
00422    TH2* hAsymVsBunchId_X45 = (TH2*) o["hAsymVsBunchId_X45"];
00423    TH2* hAsymVsBunchId_Y45 = (TH2*) o["hAsymVsBunchId_Y45"];
00424 
00425    SpinStateSetIter iSS = gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
00426    
00427    for ( ; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS)
00428    {
00429       string  sSS   = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
00430       Color_t color = RunConfig::AsColor(*iSS);
00431 
00432       string grName;
00433       TGraphErrors *gr;
00434       TFitResultPtr fitres;
00435 
00436       //
